posts.post_content:
Jennings sold but new low price for
Huggins PSA 3 Tolstoi (only one PSA higher)  $279 

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=104599&stc=1&d=1372342533[/url]

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=104598&stc=1&d=1372342533[/url]
Come on Greg--5 open threads is not playing by the rules that everyone else has to abide by.

[quote name="GoldenAge50s" post=1164956]Come on Greg--5 open threads is not playing by the rules that everyone else has to abide by.[/QUOTE]

+1

Greg, maybe you can ask Leon to clean this up into one thread that says something like "6 mid-grade t206 with tougher backs".  It's definitely not fair to everyone else who is playing by the rules.
I honestly don't know what the "rules" are that you refer to.  Limit on how many offers posted or bumped on same day?   Let me know.

Stated right at the beginning, under Auctions: Only 2-3 open threads at any one time and discussed again in this recent thread about open threads & consolidating one's listings:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=172423&highlight=B%2FS%2FT+rules[/url]

Because of the number of us that use these BST sections it's only fair for everyone to abide by these limits, otherwise it becomes a war of needless "bumping".

I also suggest to EVERYONE that if your item hasn't sold after 2, maybe 3 bumps @ the most, that it probably isn't going to sell at all and it should just fall off the front page & try something else!
Bump for lower price on Huggins.
